title: tui: Fix environment-dependent test TestShowSessionsMultipleOpensPicker
description: TestShowSessionsMultipleOpensPicker (app_detach_test.go:192) fails in agent-context environments because showSessions() exits early (app.go:786) based on env vars checked by IsAgentContext() (session.go:345). Fix: clear ADAF_TURN_ID, ADAF_SESSION_ID, and ADAF_AGENT with t.Setenv before calling showSessions().
